title: Summoners rift wont give options for Ranked
body: I go to play summoners rift and it only gives me two options "blind pick" and "draft pick." Nothing has been said by riot that i am aware of. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: We were having a few issues with our login servers, so as a method of loss prevention, we disabled Ranked Play. Everything should be cleared up at this point, so go ahead and see if you can queue for Ranked again!
